title: "Koi Nami Element" skin bug in bot games.
body: In the bot games loading screen, bot Nami sometimes appears with the name "Koi Nami Element" but with just her normal skin. I think her Koi skin was meant to be used here but code wasn't completed or something?

replies.body: Zombiemaster is correct - Nami does have a chroma pack, and it's called Element. The chromas are yellow, white and purple. When you see Koi Nami Element, are you seeing Koi Nami (pink skin) or one of the chroma colors?
It's her regular every day skin on the picture.. I honestly don't recall how she appears In the game itself though.
I'm pretty sure that's the name of the chroma that's being used, since Koi Nami has a chroma pack.
